quick_answer.text: A standard 12 oz can of Sprite contains 140 calories, mostly from sugars.

faqs.q: How many calories in a can of Sprite?
faqs.a: A standard 12 oz can has 140 calories.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a can of Sprite?
faqs.a: About 38 g of carbs, all from sugars, with 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is there protein or fat in Sprite?
faqs.a: No protein or fat; it's a zero-fat, zero-protein soda.

faqs.q: How does Diet Sprite compare in calories?
faqs.a: Diet Sprite has 0 calories per can, using artificial sweeteners.

faqs.q: Does can size affect calories in Sprite?
faqs.a: Yes; larger cans like 20 oz have more, around 233 kcal.
